body.name: cocopar Portable Monitor 15.6 Inch 1080P Travel Monitor with Speaker HDMI USB-C External Monitor for Laptop MacBook Surface PC Xbox PS5 Switch, with Cover Stand VESA

features: 【Portable Monitor for Laptops】Cocopar laptop screen extender is the ideal portable monitor for Macbook, Surface Pro, Surface Laptop, Lenovo Laptop, HP Laptop, Dell Laptop, ASUS Laptop, etc. This second monitor for laptop supports Extend and Mirror Mode, bringing you efficiency for meetings, work from home, and presentations.

【FHD Portable Monitor VESA Mountable】Featuring a 1080P resolution, 72% color gamut, 178° FULL viewing angle, HDR, and Low Blue Light Super Clear IPS A-grade screen, this Cocopar 15.6 inch portable screen for laptop with two VESA holes can be easily and stably mounted on a stand for landscape and vertical mode for high productivity.

【Plug and Play USB-C Monitor】Cocopar portable laptop monitor provides 2 Full-featured USB-C ports and a mini HDMI port, is compatible with most laptops, PC, PS4, and Xbox. Only One single USB-C Cable is required for both power supply & display and supports power pass-through reverse charging. NOTE: Your device should support thunderbolt 3.0/4.0 or USB 3.1 Type C DP ALT-MODE.

【Portable & Light Weight】Cocopar travel monitor for laptop is the ideal companion for all your business trips and home office. Measures only 4mm (0.2 inches) at the slimmest point and 726g (1.59 pounds) weight. Coming with a Smart Stand Case, this travel monitor is well-protected and flexible to use anywhere you need a second screen for laptop.

【BUY WITH CONFIDENCE】Cocopar portable computer monitor comes with a 30-day no-hassle return service, 24-month product guarantee, and best customer service. For any quality problem within 2 years, we'll REPLACE, NOT REPAIR the monitor. Click 'Add to Cart' now and get your portable screen completely risk-free!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Mobile Monitor for Laptop 2 Portable Computer Monitor 3 Travel Monitor for Laptop 4 Switch Portable Monitor 5 Portable Gaming Monitor

Why it doesn't work when I connect the monitor with my devices by my our USB-C cable. Please make sure the USB-C port on your laptop is a thunderbolt 3/4 port or supports display There are two kinds of USB-C cables, USB-C charging cable and USB-C video cable (the original one). Your own cable may be only a charging cable. What if my laptop doesn't have a USB-C or HDMI port?(e.g Surface Pro/ HP Elitebook/old MacBook ) Please get in touch with our support team and ask for an adapter. What should I do if my monitor flickers? Please make sure you’re powering the monitor by the original wall charger we provided in the package. Is this monitor a touchscreen? No, this monitor is a non-touch screen. My Android phone has a USB-C port, does this monitor work with my phone/tablet by the original USB-C to USB-C cable? Only some series of Samsung phones(Galaxy S8/S9/S10/S20/S21/S22series; Galaxy Note8/9/10/20series; Galaxy Fold, Z Fold 2/3/4) work with the monitor by the original USB-C cable we provided. Other phones/tablets need an HDTV cable to work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cocopar...an impressive portable laptop monitor!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this portable laptop monitor, and it has truly exceeded my expectations, especially given its budget-friendly price. The sleek design is just the beginning of its impressive features.Firstly, the picture quality is outstanding, offering crisp and vibrant visuals for work and entertainment. Whether I'm watching videos, editing documents, or browsing the web, the display consistently impresses.One of its standout features is its portability; it's lightweight and easy to carry, ideal for those on the move. Its slim design adds to its convenience, and setup is a breeze. It's compatible with various devices, making it a versatile addition to any tech setup.What sets this monitor apart is its exceptional value. The quality and build feel surprisingly durable and well-constructed for its price, making it an excellent choice for expanding your screen space without a hefty price tag.In conclusion, this portable laptop monitor is a hidden gem. Its remarkable display quality, sleek design, and affordability make it a must-have for anyone needing extra screen real estate. Whether you're a student, a professional, or just love multimedia, don't underestimate the value this monitor offers – it's a fantastic investment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic portable monitor
reviews.reviewText: This is a fantastic monitor to carry along with your laptop if you have need to have a second screen, especially if you are working while on the road. Like many, I am spoiled while in the office with a docking station and dual monitor setup. When I'm on the road, however, having only a single screen on the laptop seems so limiting, and lugging along a second, traditional 15" LCD monitor would be too cumbersome.Enter the Cocopar Portable Monitor! It's no more bulky than your typical iPad, but adds the ability to carry an extra screen right inside the same backpack where you carry your laptop. I was actually pleasantly surprised by how solid this little unit feels; it is not overly flexible nor does it feel "cheap." The included cover/stand solidly closes with a magnet and should do an excellent job of protecting the screen on its travels.On my Windows 11 based laptop with a USB-C connector, setup was super-simple. I simply plugged the included USB-C to USB-C cable into the monitor and laptop and, within seconds, the monitor was identified and operating as a second screen. The build in cover/stand was flexible enough that I could adjust the angle and the picture was excellent. It supported the same native resolution as my laptop's screen (1920 x 1080 ), so I didn't have any unusual artifacting or weird resizing issues when I would drag windows between the two screens. For those who may not have USB-C connectors on their computers, the Cocopar also comes with additional cables; one USB-A and one HDMI cable, along with the traditional power adapter that converts the USB-A cable to a standard electrical plug so you can use normal wall current to power the device. When using the USB-C to USB-C cable and a laptop with a powered USB-C port, you only need to plug in the one cable for both image and power.All in all, this is a handy little extra monitor that slips easily inside my laptop bag alongside the laptop itself and comes with me everywhere I go! I can now sit at a remote location, like a hotel, and have the same two monitor setup while remote as I do when in the office.Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality Portable Monitor with Affordable Price
reviews.reviewText: I rarely write a review but this is my 3rd brand of portable monitor that I have purchased. Compared to the other 2 different brands, I'm very satisfied with the quality of the picture on this monitor. The monitor itself is also very light and compact. The cover, that we can also use as a stand, is a very nice addition to the monitor. I've been recommending this monitor to family and friends who travel a lot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great monitor! Light weight with excellent clarity.
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to use with my Nintendo switch as an external monitor so I don’t hog the TV and with my laptop when I need dual screen. In both use cases, it’s been excellent. Easy to set up, easy to use. I was surprised how light weight it is, while still being sturdy. I like that it is easy to store when I’m not using it and easy to bring out when I need it. Customer support has been extremely friendly. It was simple to register the monitor for future support. Would definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great! Good price!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this to extend my laptop screen when I travel. It worked perfectly right out of the box, and provides a clear, sharp picture.Pros: good size, clear picture, lightweight and portable, comes with a cover that doubles as a monitor stand, great price.Cons: it's turned itself off a couple of times, switch on the side didn't seem to do anything, but disconnecting and reconnecting the USB-C cable turned the monitor back on. To be fair, I haven't checked the manual yet to see if this behavior is by design.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for My Application
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the cocopar 15.6" full HD portable display for my flight simulation system. I have three large monitors driven by 2 PCs that display the view out the cockpit windows. I added the portable display to show the key cockpit instruments so I don't have to pan the main cockpit window display during takeoff and landing.The cocopar display arrived in packaging that is almost in the Apple class for quality. The box was sturdy and really protected the display and additional components. All the cables needed were provided. The User Manual was complete, well written and easy to understand. I had the monitor connected to my system, configured and operational in 15 minutes. The one concern I had with such a small monitor was my ability to easily read the instruments with just a glance given that my eyes were farther away than might be normal. Not a problem at all during a live flight - screen is clear, bright with vivid colors.I didn't connect the monitor to my iPhone or laptop and I didn't use the internal speakers so I can't comment on those features.Bottom line - this is a terrific monitor and suits my needs perfectly.

I recently purchased the Cocopar Portable Monitor and I am extremely satisfied with my purchase. I needed a portable monitor for my work while traveling, and this monitor has proven to be the perfect solution.Firstly, I want to mention the fast delivery. I received the monitor the day after I purchased it. The package arrived in perfect condition.Setting up the monitor was a breeze. It comes with everything you need, including cables and a protective cover. I simply connected the monitor to my laptop using the USB-C cable and it was ready to use. No additional drivers or software installation was required.The monitor is light and compact. It is incredibly portable and easy to carry around. The design is sleek and modern, and it looks great on my desk. The build quality is solid, giving me confidence that it will withstand the rigors of traveling.The display quality is outstanding. The 15.6-inch screen produces vivid and crisp visuals. The colors are vibrant and the details are sharp. Whether I am working on different documents, editing images, or watching videos, the display is amazing.Another feature that I appreciate is the multiple connectivity options. The monitor can be connected to my laptop using the USB-C cable, but it also has HDMI and mini DisplayPort options. This versatility allows me to use the monitor with different devices, such as my gaming console or even my iPone.I am seriously considering purchasing another one so that instead of using it as an extended view to my laptop, I use two monitors with my standard keyboard (without the laptop). This will greatly enhance my productivity, especially when working on multiple files etc.Overall, I am extremely pleased with the Cocopar Portable Monitor. It offers everything I need for my work while traveling – fast delivery, easy setup, amazing display quality, and portability. I highly recommend it!

I agree with the other reviews. This is a great monitor. Clear picture quality, easy on the eyes, very light to carry, just plug in the type C to type C and you are good to go. It comes with a protective case and a 2 yr warranty. Wish I found this monitor sooner.

reviews.reviewTitle: Pantalla portátil de alta durabilidad y versatilidad: ¡Un accesorio imprescindible!
reviews.reviewText: Recientemente adquirí esta pantalla portátil, y debo decir que ha sido una de las mejores inversiones que he hecho en mucho tiempo. Desde el primer momento, he quedado sorprendido por la durabilidad y versatilidad de este producto.La durabilidad es uno de los aspectos más importantes para mí, ya que viajo mucho y necesito un producto que resista el uso y desgaste del día a día. Esta pantalla portátil ha superado con creces mis expectativas en este sentido. El material de la carcasa es de alta calidad y resistente, lo que garantiza una larga vida útil y protección contra golpes y rasguños.En cuanto a la versatilidad, esta pantalla portátil es perfecta para adaptarse a diversas situaciones. La he utilizado en reuniones de trabajo, presentaciones, y también para disfrutar de películas y series en mis ratos libres. Además, es compatible con una amplia variedad de dispositivos, desde ordenadores portátiles hasta consolas de videojuegos, lo que me permite sacarle el máximo provecho en cualquier circunstancia.La calidad de imagen es excepcional, con colores vivos y un contraste sorprendente. La resolución es perfecta para disfrutar de todo tipo de contenido multimedia, y el tamaño de la pantalla es ideal para llevarla cómodamente en mi mochila sin ocupar mucho espacio.El proceso de instalación y configuración es muy sencillo, lo cual es un gran punto a favor. En pocos minutos, pude conectar mi portátil y comenzar a utilizar la pantalla sin complicaciones. Además, el soporte técnico es muy eficiente y siempre está dispuesto a ayudar en caso de dudas o problemas.En resumen, esta pantalla portátil ha sido una excelente adición a mi arsenal tecnológico. La durabilidad y versatilidad que ofrece son insuperables, y estoy convencido de que será de gran utilidad para cualquier usuario que necesite una solución práctica y eficiente para llevar una pantalla adicional a todas partes. ¡Muy recomendable!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've had this csreen for one day and it's working well. Easy to set up nice clear images and videos. I recommend.
Très bon produit; bon rapport qualité prix. Tous les câbles nécessaires sont fournis. Bonne qualité de l’affichage
